oe1: I like the course because self-study is a bit easy even without the instructors clear class objective. The course is quite interesting and easy to understand

oe3: He has some interesting, deep-thinking videos that stimulates the class to analyze. He is very respectful and kind. He loves what he does and tries his best to make the class fun.

oe1: The discourse

oe1: I enjoy the open discussions that are open to all class members

oe1: I enjoy that everything is presented with real world examples and we are given clear to understand examples to back up the theory
oe2: Less assignments that feel like make-work projects. The Design Journal is a neat idea but would be better implemented if the entries were cut in half but we were required to pick a topic from the past few weeks and delve much more in depth. Longer entries but fewer of them. It currently feels too much like I am rewriting my notes and it is hard to go further into detail on topics.
oe3: Willingness to get feedback from students
